Comment: I'm classifying this as a protein rather than a peptide because it is ~160 aa in length.  At least one definition of a peptide is that it is less than 50 aa
Leptin.Definition: A protein hormone secreted by adipocytes  involved in the regulation of body fat stores.  The human form is  ~167 aa, ~16 kD encoded by the leptin gene (LEP).  (adapted from Wikipedia)
